ModMetaData.name: RD - Slow Down
ModMetaData.author: lost_RD
ModMetaData.description:
Reverses the fast forward options so they slow down the game instead. Useful for achieving a constant video framerate when the game is under heavy stress, or for slowing down combat.
To enable or disable slow mode, use the keybind (defaults to the 5 button) or the mod settings menu.
